line_1: And flies when discord shakes her brand with quarrels rife.
line_2: Will not endure the frown of angry strife;

line_1: And flies when discord shakes her brand with quarrels rife.
line_2: Who blast the joys of calm domestic life,

line_1: Are such ensamples emong women rife?
line_2: And swore to love her all my length of life;

line_1: Are such ensamples emong women rife?
line_2: Where haidegives are daunc'd to harp and fife.

line_1: Are such ensamples emong women rife?
line_2: She soon forgot she was another's wife,
